title: Fallout New Vegas [PC-DVD][English][www.consolasatope.com]
description:
Developer: Obsidian
Company: Bethesda Softworks
Fallout: New Vegas is an action / RPG, Fallout 3's successor.
Language: English
This is not a direct sequel or an expansion, but it is a single game, with characters and different locations, but always within the Fallout universe.

Takes place during the year 2280, three years after the events in Fallout 3, and 203 years after the "Great War" of 2077.

Fallout: New Vegas begins in a manner similar to Fallout 3, but at the same time completely different. How is this approach? Basically making the first phase is based on both the creation of the character, but based on Fallout 3 on the birth of a baby, and in New Vegas in touch with our character death and suffering a facial reconstruction of the hands of a not recommended surgeon.

In any case, the customization tool is very similar in both games and, despite some limitations, we can decide the look of our hero or heroine. Then we will have our SPECIAL points, and we submit to a Rorschach test Spot memorable replacing GOAT that surpassed the original game.

We begin in the town of Goodsprings, in the state of Nevada, where we will hold our first missions and where books are also fighting to recover the initial pulse to VATS and mutant creatures that populate the area.
